SEARCH
Package com.zoi4erom.animalnetworkbook.aui

Class ShelterView

java.lang.Object
com.zoi4erom.animalnetworkbook.aui.ShelterView
All Implemented Interfaces:
Renderable
public class ShelterView extends Object implements Renderable
The `ShelterView` class provides user interface functionality related to shelters in an animal network book application. It implements the `Renderable` interface to handle rendering tasks.
Since:
2024-02-02

  • Method Details

    • shelterName

      public static String shelterName() throws IOException
      Prompts the user to input the name of a shelter.
      Returns:
      The name of the shelter entered by the user.
      Throws:
      IOException - If an I/O error occurs during the input process.

    • shelterPhoneNumber

      public static String shelterPhoneNumber() throws IOException
      Prompts the user to input the phone number of a shelter.
      Returns:
      The phone number of the shelter entered by the user.
      Throws:
      IOException - If an I/O error occurs during the input process.

    • shelterCapacityOfAnimals

      public static String shelterCapacityOfAnimals() throws IOException
      Prompts the user to input the maximum capacity of animals in the shelter. Validates that the input consists only of digits.
      Returns:
      The maximum capacity of animals entered by the user.
      Throws:
      IOException - If an I/O error occurs.

    • shelterAddress

      public static String shelterAddress() throws IOException
      Prompts the user to input the address of the shelter. Validates that the input is not empty.
      Returns:
      The address entered by the user.
      Throws:
      IOException - If an I/O error occurs.

    • selectShelterFromList

      public static Shelter selectShelterFromList() throws IOException
      Prompts the user to select a shelter from the list of available shelters.
      Returns:
      The selected shelter, or null if the selection is canceled or an error occurs.
      Throws:
      IOException - If an I/O error occurs.

    • render

      public void render() throws IOException
      Renders the main menu for monitoring shelters and processes user input. This method uses a console prompt for user interaction.
      Specified by:
      render in interface Renderable
      Throws:
      IOException - if an I/O error occurs.

    • renderSearch

      public void renderSearch() throws IOException
      Renders the search menu for monitoring shelters and processes user input. This method uses a console prompt for user interaction.
      Throws:
      IOException - if an I/O error occurs.
